pr_title: MINOR: fix and improve StreamsConfig JavaDocs

timeline.message: MINOR: fix and improve StreamsConfig JavaDocs

timeline.bodyText: Hey @mjsax . Sorry, but I didn't follow this change. How does this test pass when it expects the value to be 7, but it's now 3?
timeline.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText: Ups -- this change should not be in the PR (I was just trying out locally if 3 is accepted -- the test fails of course for this case).
replies.author: mjsax
